entries.title: Biden, first lady thank service members in Christmas calls
entries.description: President Joe Biden is celebrating a quiet Christmas with his family at the White House and has spoken with American service members stationed around the world

entries.title: 'Avatar' sequel sails to 2nd week atop the box office
entries.description: “Avatar: The Way of Water” sailed to the top of the box office in its second weekend

entries.title: 4 dead, 36 hurt in bus crash on icy road in British Columbia
entries.description: Canadian authorities say a bus rolled over on an icy highway in British Columbia on Christmas Eve, killing four people and injuring three dozen

entries.title: Migrants dropped near VP Harris home on frigid Christmas Eve
entries.description: Local organizers in Washington say three buses of recent migrant families arrived from Texas near the home of Vice President Kamala Harris in record-setting cold on Christmas Eve

entries.title: Judge won't drop charges for former gubernatorial candidate
entries.description: A federal judge in Florida has refused to throw out criminal charges against former Democratic gubernatorial candidate Andrew Gillum

entries.title: Florida deputy fatally shot during Christmas Eve standoff
entries.description: A sheriff’s deputy in the Florida Panhandle was fatally shot Christmas Eve during a standoff with a suspect who was being served a warrant

entries.title: Buffalo hit by 'most devastating storm' in city's history, governor says
entries.description: At least 23 people have died from the cold, wintry weather that's wreaking havoc across the U.S. over Christmas weekend.

entries.title: Prosecutors: Paris shooting suspect wanted to kill migrants
entries.description: The man suspected of fatally shooting three Kurds in Paris told investigators that he wanted to kill migrants or foreigners and then himself

entries.title: US warns of possible attack in Islamabad amid security fears
entries.description: The U.S. Embassy in Islamabad is warning its staff of a possible attack on Americans at a top hotel in Pakistan’s capital

entries.title: Ex-Maldives leader gets 11 years for money laundering, bribe
entries.description: A court in Maldives has found the former president guilty of money laundering and accepting a bribe and sentenced him to 11 years in prison

entries.title: WATCH:  Christmas traditions from around the world
entries.description: ABC News' Ines De La Cuertara presents unique and special celebrations of Christmas traditions from around the globe.

entries.title: WATCH:  Monster storm causes chaotic holiday travel
entries.description: A major storm battering much of the U.S. is causing headaches at airports and on roadways.

entries.title: Royal children join Prince William, Kate for Christmas service
entries.description: This is the first time in two years that the British royal family has attended Christmas service, due to the COVID-19 pandemic.

entries.title: Soccer star Pelé's family shares updates from his hospital bed
entries.description: The family of soccer icon Pelé were together at his hospital bed on Christmas Eve.

entries.title: Leader of ex-communist rebels becomes Nepal's new PM
entries.description: The leader of former communist rebels has become Nepal’s new prime minister with the support from his ex-opponent and other smaller political parties

entries.title: South Africa counts damage, death by tanker truck explosion
entries.description: South Africa is coming to grips with the full extent of the destruction and deaths caused by a Christmas Eve tanker truck explosion

entries.title: China's COVID-19 surge raises odds of new coronavirus mutant
entries.description: Could the COVID-19 surge in China unleash a new coronavirus mutant on the world

entries.title: Pope's lament: Icy winds of war buffet humanity at Christmas
entries.description: Pope Francis has used his Christmas message Sunday to lament the “icy winds of war” buffeting humanity

entries.title: Christmas Eve shooting at UK pub leaves 1 dead, 3 wounded
entries.description: Police say a Christmas Eve shooting at a pub in northwest England killed a young woman and wounded three men

entries.title: US slams Taliban for women's NGO jobs ban in Afghanistan
entries.description: The U.S. has condemned the Taliban for ordering non-governmental groups in Afghanistan to stop employing women

entries.title: Smoking laptop forces plane evacuation at New York Airport
entries.description: Emergency responders evacuated a JetBlue flight at JFK International Airport in New York City as a result of a laptop emitting smoke Saturday evening

entries.title: Some Ukrainians move Christmas to detach again from Russia
entries.description: Ukrainians usually celebrate Christmas on Jan. 7, as do Russians.

entries.title: Harris' widow on field in Pittsburgh as his No. 32 retired
entries.description: The Pittsburgh Steelers retired the No. 32 of Hall of Fame running back Franco Harris during a bittersweet halftime ceremony

entries.title: WATCH:  Frigid weather can't stop Santas surfing off Florida coast
entries.description: Scores of surfing Santas turned out along Florida’s Space Coast to ride some waves on Christmas Eve despite the freezing cold weather—and raised more than $300,000 for local non-profits.

entries.title: WATCH:  Airplanes struggle to land amid powerful winds at DC airport
entries.description: Strong winds made it difficult for flights to land at Reagan Washington National Airport outside Washington, D.C., on Friday, forcing at least one aircraft back into the sky to try again.

entries.title: Actor Orlando Brown pleads not guilty to assault charges
entries.description: Former child star Orlando Brown has pleaded not guilty to misdemeanor assault charges stemming from an alleged altercation in Lima, Ohio
